For restaurants turn left, straight ahaead for approx. 1mile and for Downtown Disney approx 2miles. You can walk to the restaurants e.g. TGI Friday within half an hour and to Downtown Disney within an hour. Taxi back from Downtown Disney was $ 10 including tip. Many hotels in the area, just compare thru their internet sites and you may find the Homewood Suites as a real bargain. Would always stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Poor Hotel in the Hilton Line-Up”
Reviews.Author: 007CubsFan
Reviews.Content: Well, I stayed in their sister property the other night (Hilton Garden Inn) and they got 2 stars. This property was worse. I made a reservation for a 1 bedroom suite. Now, I may not know the exact definition of a bedroom or suite, but previous experiences lead me to believe there would be a separation, like a wall, between the bedroom and living area. What I got was an oversized hotel room, more like a studio at that. Biggest gripe was the location of the TV. From its position (and limited (due to mount) turning ability), there is not a clear view from either the bed or the couch. Service at checkin was terrible. I wont even bother you with my rant. The breakfast has limited hours (6:30-9:30) so get up early and get their early! I went down at 9am and everything was nearly gone. Nothing looked fresh or appealing (pics attached). Just powdered eggs. home potatoes, and some sausage patties that looked like they have been out since 6am. They were out of juice; only water and coffee. I took about 10 bites and left. Luckily it is free; I would never have paid for it. No service either. As with the sister property - no one spoke to me all. Final peeve was the lack of hot water. It was warm but I like a nice hot shower. If hot water is your thing then get up early for that too because you may not have it if you are lazy like me at 9:30. Not the best property in the Hilton chain. WiFi was free as is the parking (although the wired internet in the room did not work). NOTE TO ATT CUSTOMERS: Really bad coverage at this property. If making calls and using your phone (like an iphone) are important - go elsewhere. Never a good signal and often it went out completely.

Reviews.Title: “Good Place except for Breakfast”
Reviews.Author: eduncanz28
Reviews.Content: Nice hotel except for breakfast. Check-in no problem. Checked in Fri. night after going to Disney. Clerk says breakfast is 7-10 on weekends. Arrived in lobby at about 9:15 am Saturday to see most tables full of dirty dishes and many food bins empty at breakfast bar. Girl at breakfast area states it is normally staffed by 4 people, but today they only have 2 working. Breakfast is very basuc. Don't count on this breakfast if you are in to healthy eating. It mainly consists of sausage, eggs, toast, egg beaters, cereal and waffles. There is also milk, juice, yogurt and coffee. Whole oranges were present this am. Cereal consisted of Rice Krispies. When I pointed out empty Cheerios bin, staff said no more Cheerios were available. On Sun. morning I once again arrived at the breakfast area around 9:15 am only to be greeted with a significantly worse scene. There were now obviously more people staying at the hotel, as long lines of people were standing in front of all food bins, many of which were empty. In addition, every single table was either occupied or cluttered with dirty dishes. Ended up eating on hearth in front of fireplace since no table was available. Asked to speak to manager - desk clerk says she's busy working on the breakfast situation, that she just became aware of the issue, and can't speak to me. I replied to the desk clerk that the same breakfast issues were already present yesterday, but the clerk could offer no further assistance. Breakfast was basically the same except no fruit whatsoever. Still out of Cheerios. One positive about food area is coffee and hot tea are available 24 hrs/day. Room itself was very good overall except one kitchen cabinet door was quite loose and living room air conditioner struggled to get room cool. Bedroom A/C worked well. Parking was very good - free and secure-appearing. Location is great for Disney. Turn right out of hotel and go 2.5 miles for Wal-Mart Supercenter. Grocery store next to McDonalds off I-4, exit 68 is very high in prices.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay”
Reviews.Author: sapish
Reviews.Content: Very impressed with both this hotel and the personnel. Stayed three nights with husband and granddaughter. Our room was clean and comfortable. Housekeeping seemed to go to extra lengths to tidy up as well as clean while we were out. Expecially impressed with Diane at the concierge desk and Frances in the dining area. Very convenient to Disney World. Would definitely recommend.

HotelInfo.Name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Lake Buena Vista-Orlando
HotelInfo.Address: 11428 Marbella Palm Court, Orlando, FL 32836
